nodes.text: Zinn Classet was a Human male bounty hunter active during the Galactic Civil War. He led a team of hunters including fellow Human Andar Sizzton, Gamorrean Jargool Muus, Gotal Uthil Ren'kacal, and Aqualish Negollup. He owned a starship, the Zinn's Revenge, a modified CorelliSpace Gymsnor-3 light freighter. During the Galactic Civil War, Classet and his hunters were contracted by authorities at the Spice Mines of Kessel to hunt down a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives who had liberated a Wookiee slave named Kentara they had purchased on Deysum III. He wore red and green battle armor, and carried two modified blaster pistols.
